title: Example Task - Implement User Authentication
description:
Create POST /api/auth/login endpoint with JWT token generation.

Requirements:
- Accept email and password
- Validate credentials against database
- Return JWT token on success
- Return 401 on invalid credentials
- Rate limit to 5 attempts per minute

Implementation files:
- src/api/auth.ts (new file)
- src/middleware/rate-limit.ts (update)
- src/utils/jwt.ts (new file)

Follow existing patterns in src/api/users.ts for API structure.
acceptance_criteria: Returns JWT token on valid credentials

context.patterns_to_follow: See src/api/users.ts for API endpoint structure

notes: JWT secret should come from environment variable
Token expiry: 24 hours for access token
Create verification task for agent-c after implementation
